data.eml:eml: On a new genus and species of freshwater crab from Vietnam, with comments on the nomenclatural status of Orientalia Dang, 1975 (Crustacea: Brachyura: Potamidae: Potamiscinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yeo, Darren C. J., Ng, Peter K. L. (2005): On a new genus and species of freshwater crab from Vietnam, with comments on the nomenclatural status of Orientalia Dang, 1975 (Crustacea: Brachyura: Potamidae: Potamiscinae). Zootaxa 917: 1-15, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171066
